crazyballrun.game.level

Class Goal

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.level.Goal

  • public class Goal
extends java.lang.Object
    The Goal-class represents one state of the Statistics-instance of a level. This means, it defines a static goal for each player by defining a minimum value for each attribute and optionally a deadline for time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Goal(int player)
      Creates a goal for a particular player.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double get(Statistics.ValueType attr)
      Gets the minimum value of an attribute the player needs to reach its goal.
      java.util.ArrayList<Rectangle3D> getCheckpoints()
      Gets the list of checkpoints for the player.
      int getPlayerId()
      Gets the id of the player the goal is for.
      long getTimeLimit()
      Gets the time limit of the player in miliseconds.
      void set(java.lang.String attr, java.lang.String value)
      Sets one minimum value for a specific attribute (statistical value) or other goal-specific settings (like checkpoints).
      void setTimeLimit(long time)
      Sets a time limit for the player in miliseconds.
